title: ICE: When casting `&[T]` to `*const [T]`
body:
STR

``` rust
fn main() {
    let ok: *const [u8] = &[0u8, 1, 2];

    let slice: &[u8] = [0u8, 1, 2];
    let ice = slice as *const [u8];
}
```

Backtrace:

error: internal compiler error: translating unsupported cast: &[u8] (cast_other) -> *const [u8] (cast_other)
